mapper.select: select if(payment_status_code in ('S08'), true, false) as isCancelPayment from order_payment where order_no = #{orderNo}
select if(order_status_code = 'O05', false, true) as isNonOrderComplete from order_info where order_no = #{orderNo}

select p.order_amount, p.delivery_charge_amount, p.ssp_point, p.sales_amount, p.payment_amount, p.payment_date, t.transaction_id, p.payment_method_code as payment_method_name, p.payment_status_code as payment_status_name, p.cancel_date, p.cancel_reason from order_payment p inner join order_payment_detail pd on p.order_no = pd.order_no and p.payment_method_code = pd.payment_method_code inner join order_transaction t on pd.order_no = t.order_no and pd.pg_type = t.pg_type where p.order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.update: update order_payment set payment_status_code = 'S09', -- 취소요청 코드 cancel_date = now(), cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, cancel_reason_code = #{cancelReasonCode}, update_user_id = #{userId}, update_date = now() where order_no = #{orderNo}
update order_info set order_status_code = 'O06', -- 취소요청 코드 update_user_id = #{userId}, update_date = now() where order_no = #{orderNo}

-- 취소 요청 후 환불 정보에 대한 수정으로 -- 불필요 한 수정자, 수정일시는 제외(로직 변경 시 해당부분 추가할 것) update order_payment_detail set refund_bank_code = #{refundBankCode}, refund_bank_name = #{refundBankName}, refund_bank_account_no = #{refundBankAccountNo}, refund_depositor_name = #{refundDepositorName} where order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: select if(count(order_product_seq) != #{orderProductSeq.length}, true, false) as isPartialPaymentCancel from order_product where order_no = #{orderNo}
